name: catmint
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a herb whose smell is very attractive to cats: The cat got a whiff of our catmint plant and has been running crazily around the room ever since. I planted catmint around the edge of my garden to keep away slugs, who are not fond of its pungent taste. Synonym
catnipSee also
mint
More examplesFewer examplesThe aroma in the kitchen came from the catmint plant growing on the windowsill. The main flowering period of catmint is in spring and early summer.
